The Quadratic Formula.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" latex="x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}" display="block"><mi latex="x">x</mi><mo latex="=">=</mo><mfrac latex="\frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}"><mrow latex="-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac}"><mo latex="-">−</mo><mi latex="b">b</mi><mo latex="\pm">±</mo><msqrt latex="\sqrt{b^2-4ac}"><msup latex="b^2"><mi latex="b">b</mi><mn latex="2">2</mn></msup><mo latex="-">−</mo><mn latex="4">4</mn><mi latex="a">a</mi><mi latex="c">c</mi></msqrt></mrow><mrow latex="2a"><mn latex="2">2</mn><mi latex="a">a</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

Cauchy's Integral Formula.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" latex="f(a) = \frac{1}{2\pi i} \oint\frac{f(z)}{z-a}dz" display="block"><mi latex="f">f</mi><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="a">a</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo latex="=">=</mo><mfrac latex="\frac{1}{2\pi i}"><mn latex="1">1</mn><mrow latex="2\pi i"><mn latex="2">2</mn><mi latex="\pi">π</mi><mi latex="i">i</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo data-mjx-texclass="OP" latex="\oint">∮</mo><mfrac latex="\frac{f(z)}{z-a}"><mrow latex="f(z)"><mi latex="f">f</mi><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="z">z</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow latex="z-a"><mi latex="z">z</mi><mo latex="-">−</mo><mi latex="a">a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mi latex="d">d</mi><mi latex="z">z</mi></math>

Angle Sum Formula for Cosines.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" latex="\cos(\theta+\phi)=\cos(\theta)\cos(\phi)-\sin(\theta)\sin(\phi) " display="block"><mi latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo latex="+">+</mo><mi latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo latex="=">=</mo><mi latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mi latex="\cos">cos</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mo latex="-">−</mo><mi latex="\sin">sin</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="\theta">θ</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mi latex="\sin">sin</mi><mo data-mjx-texclass="NONE">⁡</mo><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><mi latex="\phi">ϕ</mi><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" latex="\int_D ({

Curl of a Vector Field.tex: \vec{\nabla} \times \vec{F} = \left( \frac{\partial F_z}{\partial y} - \frac{\partial F_y}{\partial z} \right) \mathbf{i} + \left( \frac{\partial F_x}{\partial z} - \frac{\partial F_z}{\partial x} \right) \mathbf{j} + \left( \frac{\partial F_y}{\partial x} - \frac{\partial F_x}{\partial y} \right) \mathbf{k}

Standard Deviation.input: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" latex="\sigma = \sqrt{ \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i -\mu)^2} " display="block"><mi latex="\sigma">σ</mi><mo latex="=">=</mo><msqrt latex="\sqrt{ \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i -\mu)^2}"><mfrac latex="\frac{1}{N}"><mn latex="1">1</mn><mi latex="N">N</mi></mfrac><munderover latex="\sum_{i=1}^N"><mo data-mjx-texclass="OP" latex="\sum">∑</mo><mrow data-mjx-texclass="ORD" latex="{i=1}"><mi latex="i">i</mi><mo latex="=">=</mo><mn latex="1">1</mn></mrow><mi latex="N">N</mi></munderover><mo latex="(" stretchy="false">(</mo><msub latex="x_i"><mi latex="x">x</mi><mi latex="i">i</mi></msub><mo latex="-">−</mo><mi latex="\mu">μ</mi><msup latex=")^2"><mo latex=")" stretchy="false">)</mo><mn latex="2">2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>

Definition of Christoffel Symbols.tex: (\nabla_X Y)^k = X^i (\nabla_i Y)^k = X^i \left( \frac{\partial Y^k}{\partial x^i} + \Gamma_{im}^k Y^m \right)
